body:
I just checked and the api directory contains a README file which explains
its purpose.

https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/api/README
On 14 Mar 2015 08:13, "Minux Ma" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> all those directories are pretty standard, except perhaps api, which lists
> api additions for each go major version, and is used to make sure no
> api changes ever occur.
